title: NBA, NCAAF, Dana White, Big Ben, Scott Boras
itunes:title: NBA, NCAAF, Dana White, Big Ben, Scott Boras
description:
Colin discusses how the NBA has changed for the better, why college football will return soon, why Dana White is great for sports, Ben Roethlisberger not being in shape, and his thoughts on Scott Boras' comments. Guests include Nick Wright, Urban Meyer, Tom Tolbert, and Bucky Brooks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
